list.name: Changes
list.comment:
[Driver:xl24773]
1. Submit the changes to User.java and Medicine.java when applying all the aforementioned features.
Extreme warning: If you get a serious bug after this commit, please roll back to the minimum hash value (0602b3353b226f9d960557489a3963a68e495ed4), delete the relevant module can work normally, or hash value ( da677291ca91fe9c0f87949ec1e41efb80988ddd) of the farthest stable version,
Note: No changes have been made to the gui section.
Known bug:Can't load the history file in the directory correctly after logging back in.

task.summary: [Driver:xl24773] [Navigator:mh22512] Fix structural errors, add Maven, and initially try to add a voice module.
[Driver:xl24773] [Navigator:mh22512] 1. Join the package management mode, simplify the project structure, keep the documents neat and tidy

[Driver:xl24773] [Navigator:mh22512] 1. Add a note about path errors. 2. Correct the developer information previously configured in other project environments again, this behaviour resulted in the wrong developer information in this project (Name: xleave, email:minecraft_zszf@163.com), the correct match is (Name: Xumin Lu, email:xl24773@essex.ac.uk)

[Driver:xl24773] [Navigator:mh22512] 1. Try to add a medication history module 2. Prepare for adding drug overdose feature 3. Prepare for trying to add email warnings. 4. Prepare for trying to add a medication schedule.
Note: No changes have been made to the gui section.
Known bug:Can't load the history file in the directory correctly after logging back in.

[Driver:xl24773]
1. Initial deployment to detect drug overdose function in preparation 2. Preparation for trying to add email warnings (interface has been reserved). 3. Preparation for attempting to add a medication schedule 4. Further fixes to the drug history module.
Note: No changes have been made to the gui section.
Known bug:Can't load the history file in the directory correctly after logging back in.

[Driver:xl24773]
1. Prepare for trying to add a medication schedule. 2. Further improve the function of drug overdose detection and fix bugs. 3. Try to add email warnings in preparation (already reserved interface). 4. Further fixes to the drug history module.
Note: No changes have been made to the gui section.
Known bug:Can't load the history file in the directory correctly after logging back in.

[Driver:xl24773]
1. Submit the changes to User.java and Medicine.java when applying all the aforementioned features.
Extreme warning: If you get a serious bug after this commit, please roll back to the minimum hash value (0602b3353b226f9d960557489a3963a68e495ed4), delete the relevant module can work normally, or hash value ( da677291ca91fe9c0f87949ec1e41efb80988ddd) of the farthest stable version,
Note: No changes have been made to the gui section.
Known bug:Can't load the history file in the directory correctly after logging back in.
